street_name: between the Waterworks and City Mill Rivers and railway lines further south (Marshgate).
description: Submission of details to partially discharge part Condition 3 (Material Samples) of planning permission 18/00424/REM dated 29 March 2019, in so far as they relate to the fair-faced in-situ concrete
site_name: South of the ArcelorMittal Orbit and South Plaza
decision_conditions:
Works in accordance with approved details

The development shall be carried out and retained thereafter in accordance with the following drawings and documents:
		
•	35526 UCLE Marshgate Shell & Core Quality Plan Record Sheet  dated 11th December 2019
•	Drawings 
MP403-UCLE-MGT-0001-SRA-DRA-xxxx-0100-85001 - Ceiling Types Plan - Level 01
MP403-UCLE-MGT-0000-SRA-DRA-xxxx-0100-85000 - Ceiling Types Plan - Ground Floor
MP403-UCLE-MGT-ZZZZ-SRA-DRA-xxxx-0100-72350 - FZ Atrium Structural Concrete Visual Finish
MP403-UCLE-MGT-ZZZZ-SRA-DRA-xxxx-0100-71151 - South Elevation Fluid Zone Structural Concrete Visual Finish
MP403-UCLE-MGT-ZZZZ-SRA-DRA-xxxx-0100-71163 - East Elevation Fluid Zone Main Entrance
MP403-UCLE-MGT-ZZZZ-SRA-DRA-xxxx-0100-91103 - Detail - South Terrace EXT01 Structural Concrete Visual Finish
MP403-UCLE-MGT-0001-SRA-DRA-xxxx-0100-71431 - Fluid Zone - Concrete Finishes First Floor Plan
MP403-UCLE-MGT-0000-SRA-DRA-xxxx-0100-71430 - Fluid Zone - Concrete Finishes Ground Floor Plan
MP403-UCLE-MGT-ZZZZ-SRA-DRA-0220-0100-22001 (002) bolt hole positions


Reason: To ensure that the development is undertaken in accordance with the approved drawings.
